headline: Wall Street Analysts Positive on Equinix (EQIX)
summary: Equinix, Inc. (NASDAQ:EQIX) is one of the best dividend stocks in the real estate sector. On November 10, DBS analyst Andy Yu reiterated a Buy call on Equinix, along with a target price of $1,218. In a separate business update, dated November 20, Equinix mentioned that the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has concluded […]

headline: Is Now the Right Moment to Reassess Equinix After Its 13% Monthly Drop?
summary: Wondering if Equinix is a smart buy right now? You are not alone, given how much the stock's value narrative is debated among investors. The share price has slipped 2.0% over the past week and is down 13.3% for the past month, adding to a steeper 22.3% decline year-to-date. Long-term holders have still seen gains of 16.1% over five years. Recent headlines have focused on increased data center demand and Equinix's ongoing expansion into emerging markets. This has added a fresh layer of...
